references.paper_title: Optimal tuning of the hybrid Monte Carlo algorithm
references.reason: This paper provides key theoretical analyses of HMC's efficiency and optimal tuning, which are extended in this paper to non-smooth scenarios.

references.paper_title: The geometric foundations of Hamiltonian Monte Carlo
references.reason: This paper gives a comprehensive understanding of the geometric aspects of HMC and provides a framework for improving the algorithm, which is relevant to addressing challenges presented by ReLU networks.

references.paper_title: Age progression/regression by conditional adversarial autoencoder
references.reason: This paper introduces the UTKFace dataset, a real-world dataset used in the empirical evaluation of the proposed theoretical results.
